articles.content: OnePlus has published its first teaser for its next project, presumably the OnePlus 9 series. While the company is yet to mention the teaser on any of its social media channels, CEO Pete Lau has. Add… [+1435 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft founder Bill Gates reveals the reason he uses an Android phone instead of an iPhone - The Independent
articles.description: The interview was conduced on Clubhouse, which founder Paul Davidson says is receiving an Android app
articles.content:
Microsoft founder Bill Gates has revealed why he still prefers Android devices over Apples iPhones.
